FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE

FAU Students Introduce BID LOCK

Improved implementation involving multi-party computation in online auctions allows for increased security to ensure privacy and ease of use

MIAMI, FL - January 26, 2023 - With the alarming increase in exploitation evident in traditional auctioning environments, (our product) aims to modernize the dated structure of conventional auctions by increasing trader security while maintaining ease of access for our customers.

Our system focuses on keeping the process of securing an auction easy for Auctioneers to handle by letting them give authority to multiple judges who will handle starting auctions and counting the bids. When securing an auction, judges, in cooperation with our server, will create a private key that will be spread between all parties through proprietary software. Spreading this private key through secret sharing will allow for the reconstruction of the key to occur only when all parties are ready. The private key is important to protect as it allows for any encrypted bid sent to the auction to be decrypted, our system prevents a malicious actor from decrypting a bid without the rest of the judges being ready.

Key Features - What does it do?

  • Secure bidding via the use of secret sharing
  • Anonymous accounts
  • Fast response, bidders are informed of a winner and the highest bid
  • Browsing auctions
  • Hosting auctions

The encrypted bidding application will be free to use for everyone. The goal is to establish a marketplace that uses a bidding system where the users can buy and sell goods. As of now, the application will be made for Windows devices. But there may be plans in the future to make it available to MacOS users.

Product tiers:
  • The auction hosting feature will be available for free
  • Multi-party auction hosting will be available for free
  • All types of accounts will be available for free

About Our Product

BID LOCK is dedicated to providing our customers with innovative solutions focusing on users’ security through employing progressive technologies. With our product, we look to give our users the peace of mind and security they deserve when bidding online. Our objective is to supply our consumers with frequent updates as well as contribute resources on how our users can further maintain their security. For more information, contact our team.
